attributes.action: ensure that airlines and power generations do not benefit from emission permits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Power generating companies were given free permits for their CO2 emissions. Now airlines are to be given free permits. In other words, they will not pay a penny for the pollution they create. Yet they will pass the full cost on to their passengers, and gain twice financially.
Both power generators and airlines are in a win-win situation: get free permits and charge their customers and passengers for something they already received for free.
Make industry pay for their share in pollution of CO2 and other emissions.
